body_html:
As far as I can tell, these are either style issues (e.g. not using curly braces around single statement if clause), and some mixing of signed and unsigned in cases were it is safe (from the context), such as

unsigned = 1 << unsigned -1

where unsigned is known to be >= 0. Do you actually see anything alarming? Maybe I missed it.

body:
As far as I can tell, these are either style issues (e.g. not using curly braces around single statement if clause), and some mixing of signed and unsigned in cases were it is safe (from the context), such as

unsigned = 1 << unsigned -1 

where unsigned is known to be >= 0. Do you actually see anything alarming? Maybe I missed it.
